title: Project Title: Website Migration, Audit & Design-Refresh
job_overview:
Project Title: Website Migration, Audit & Design-Refresh
Reports To: Operations Manager 
Location: Remote (must overlap with New Zealand business hours)
Engagement Type: Project-based contract
________________________________________
Project Summary
We’re seeking a skilled contractor to:
1.	Migrate our existing WordPress site to a new hosting environment with zero downtime
2.	Conduct a focused SEO performance audit
3.	Refresh key elements of the homepage design 
You’ll deliver a seamless migration, actionable SEO insights, and a polished homepage update.
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities
Website Migration
o	Transfer all site files, databases, DNS, and SSL to the new host
o	Verify integrity of URLs, redirects, and uptime during cutover
SEO Performance Audit
o	Analyze technical SEO (crawlability, indexation, site speed)
o	Review on-page factors (meta tags, headings, internal linking)
o	Deliver a concise audit report with prioritized recommendations
Homepage Refresh
o	Update layout and imagery on the homepage 
	Note: Texts and images will be provided and a clear creative idea for the re-design is in place. The scope of work hence entails only design work i.e. implementation of the changes, with the main task being the creation of a grid-like home-page to showcase our company’s advisers and services in a different way
o	Ensure responsive design and maintain branding consistency
o	Implement or refine lead-capture elements (forms, CTAs) throughout the website (not limited to homepage)
________________________________________
Milestones & Deliverables
1.	Migration Complete
	Site live on new host; all pages reachable; no downtime
2.	SEO Audit Report
	Summary of findings plus 5–7 high-impact SEO recommendations
3.	Homepage Refresh Live
	Refreshed homepage deployed and tested
4.	Post-Launch Check-In
	One-week review of uptime, basic analytics, and any hotfixes
________________________________________
Required Skills & Experience
•	Proven experience migrating WordPress sites to new hosts without downtime
•	Strong grasp of technical and on-page SEO best practices
•	Proficiency in front-end updates (HTML/CSS/WordPress theme tweaks)
•	Ability to produce clear, prioritized audit reports
•	Excellent communication and time management for project-based work
________________________________________
Project Fee & Rates
Please include in your proposal:
•	Fixed fee for the full scope as outlined
•	Hourly rate for any additional or out-of-scope work
________________________________________
How to Apply
Send your proposal to Upgrade to see actual info including:
1.	Brief cover note describing your approach
2.	Relevant portfolio/examples
3.	Fixed project fee, hourly rate, and estimated timeline per milestone
We look forward to partnering with a concise, delivery-focused specialist!
